_header: Benign Lady blessed might Thou be
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 263; for a variant see 2043.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘De Sancta Maria’ — three 4-line stanzas (aaab) with refrain, ‘Regina celi letare’, and burden(bb): ‘Syng we to this mery company / Regina celi letare’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Syng we to this mery companeyThat barest God in
                    v[i]rginite…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…With joy & gladdenesse syng we to theRegina celi
                        letareRegina celi
